title: Guthix staff

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Guthix staff is a god staff that can only be obtained by finishing Mage Arena I miniquest. Like the other God staves, this staff requires level 60 Magic to acquire and therefore wield. To get it, the player must defeat Kolodion the mage in all of his forms. Afterwards, they will have to pick a god to worship to receive a cape and the staff corresponding to that god. If the player has already chosen another god, the staff can be purchased from the Chamber Guardian for 80,000 coins.

Item ID2416

The Guthix staff is a god staff that can only be obtained by finishing Mage Arena I miniquest. Like the other God staves, this staff requires level 60 Magic to acquire and therefore wield. To get it, the player must defeat Kolodion the mage in all of his forms. Afterwards, they will have to pick a god to worship to receive a cape and the staff corresponding to that god. If the player has already chosen another god, the staff can be purchased from the Chamber Guardian for 80,000 coins.

The staff allows wielders to cast the Claws of Guthix spell, which must be cast 100 times inside the Mage Arena minigame to gain the ability to use it outside of the arena. The spell has a chance to lower the opponent's defence by 5% on a successful hit, which does not stack with subsequent hits and will not re-occur until the opponents defence has returned to their original level. The spell can also be temporarily powered up by casting the Charge spell first.

If not a protected item, the Guthix staff will convert into 9,600 coins upon death above level 20 Wilderness.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
26 January –
27 June 2005
  • The item was renamed from "Staff of guthix" to "Guthix staff".
  • The item's examine was changed from "It's a stick of the gods." to "A magical staff imbued with the power of Guthix."
